setFinishedOrder

public static void setFinishedOrder(Order order)
Sets the order status to it's finished in the kitchen. If the order is going to be delivered, it's set to "Klar til levering", and if the customer is going to get it self, it's set to "Klar til henting".

Parameters:
order - object

startOrder

public static void startOrder(Order order)
Sets the order status to that the cook has started making it.

Parameters:
order - is an order object
